verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father of all,
Lead us and guide us
The light of your Word
Shining within us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Father, Father, Father hear our prayer
Father, Father, Father hear our prayer

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Father of Truth
Heal and renew us
Send angels of love
To hold and protect us

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Father of mine
Knowing completely
Each thought and dream
Dwelling within me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Father, Father, Father father me
Father, Father, Father father me
Father, Father, Father father our
Prayerâ€¦
